List of Events Terms Tables

lt_events_per_term_id_2.Rd

lt_events_per_term_grade_id_2 returns a nested list of events tables by unique id (t_count_unique).

lt_events_per_term_id_2(terms, id, col_by, col_N, total = "All Patients",
  event_type = "event")

Arguments

terms

term information as character or factor dataframe, however factor levels are not repeated by class, only terms with count > 1 are listed per class. Currently terms can only be a dataframe with 2 columns. var_relabel is used as the character string used as a label in the column header for each term.
id

vector of subject identifier. Length of id must be the same as the length or number of rows of terms.
col_by

group variable that will be used for a column header. col_by has to be a factor and can not be missing. See 'Examples'.
col_N

numeric vector with information of the number of patients in the levels of col_by. This is useful if there are patients that have no adverse events can be accounted for with this argument.
total

character string that will be used as a label for a column with pooled total population, default is "All Patients". If the levels of col_by are the only columns of interest then total should be NULL
event_type

type of event that is summarized (e.g. adverse event, treatment). Default is "event".

Details

The data is split and table functions are applied to leaf nodes as follows:

See also

t_events_per_term_id, t_count_unique, t_events_summary, t_events_per_term_grade_id

Examples


library(dplyr)
library(random.cdisc.data)

ADSL <- radsl(10 , seed = 1)
ADAE <- radae(ADSL, seed = 2)

l_tbls <- tern:::lt_events_per_term_id_2(
  terms = ADAE[, c("AEBODSYS", "AEDECOD")],
  id = ADAE$USUBJID,
  col_by = ADAE$ARM,
  col_N = table(ADSL$ARM),
  total = "All Patients"
)
rbindl_rtables(l_tbls)
#> Body System or Organ Class                                  A: Drug X             B: Placebo          C: Combination         All Patients 
#>   Dictionary-Derived Term                                     (N=4)                 (N=5)                 (N=1)                 (N=10)    
#> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> - Any event -
#>   Total number of patients with at least one event           4 (100%)              5 (100%)              1 (100%)             10 (100%)   
#>   Total number of events                                        23                    24                    1                     48      
#> cl A
#>   Total number of patients with at least one event           3 (75%)               2 (40%)                0 (0%)               5 (50%)    
#>   Total number of events                                        10                    5                     0                     15      
#>   trm A_1/2                                                  3 (75%)               2 (40%)                0 (0%)               5 (50%)    
#>   trm A_2/2                                                  2 (50%)               1 (20%)                0 (0%)               3 (30%)    
#> cl B
#>   Total number of patients with at least one event           3 (75%)               4 (80%)                0 (0%)               7 (70%)    
#>   Total number of events                                        9                     13                    0                     22      
#>   trm B_1/3                                                  1 (25%)               2 (40%)                0 (0%)               3 (30%)    
#>   trm B_2/3                                                  2 (50%)               3 (60%)                0 (0%)               5 (50%)    
#>   trm B_3/3                                                  2 (50%)               4 (80%)                0 (0%)               6 (60%)    
#> cl C
#>   Total number of patients with at least one event           3 (75%)               4 (80%)               1 (100%)              8 (80%)    
#>   Total number of events                                        4                     6                     1                     11      
#>   trm C_1/1                                                  3 (75%)               4 (80%)               1 (100%)              8 (80%)    

l_tbls <- tern:::lt_events_per_term_id_2(
  terms = ADAE[, c("AEBODSYS", "AEDECOD")],
  id = ADAE$USUBJID,
  col_by = ADAE$ARM,
  col_N = table(ADSL$ARM),
  total = NULL
)
rbindl_rtables(l_tbls)
#> Body System or Organ Class                                  A: Drug X             B: Placebo          C: Combination
#>   Dictionary-Derived Term                                     (N=4)                 (N=5)                 (N=1)     
#> --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> - Any event -
#>   Total number of patients with at least one event           4 (100%)              5 (100%)              1 (100%)   
#>   Total number of events                                        23                    24                    1       
#> cl A
#>   Total number of patients with at least one event           3 (75%)               2 (40%)                0 (0%)    
#>   Total number of events                                        10                    5                     0       
#>   trm A_1/2                                                  3 (75%)               2 (40%)                0 (0%)    
#>   trm A_2/2                                                  2 (50%)               1 (20%)                0 (0%)    
#> cl B
#>   Total number of patients with at least one event           3 (75%)               4 (80%)                0 (0%)    
#>   Total number of events                                        9                     13                    0       
#>   trm B_1/3                                                  1 (25%)               2 (40%)                0 (0%)    
#>   trm B_2/3                                                  2 (50%)               3 (60%)                0 (0%)    
#>   trm B_3/3                                                  2 (50%)               4 (80%)                0 (0%)    
#> cl C
#>   Total number of patients with at least one event           3 (75%)               4 (80%)               1 (100%)   
#>   Total number of events                                        4                     6                     1       
#>   trm C_1/1                                                  3 (75%)               4 (80%)               1 (100%)
